Japanese:
//Text $1AFCA8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C610)
フレッシュな甘さ、[LINE]
アップル味のグミ。[LINE]
最大ＨＰの３０％分ＨＰが回復する。[END]
English:
//Text $1AFCA8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C610)
A gelatin-based healing medicine.[LINE]
Restores 30% of max HP for one ally.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AFC50
#WRITE(ptr,$18C62C)
とろける甘さ、[LINE]
ピーチ味のグミ。[LINE]
最大ＨＰの５０％分ＨＰが回復する。[END]
English:
//Text $1AFC50
#WRITE(ptr,$18C62C)
A gelatin-based healing medicine.[LINE]
Restores 50% of max HP for one ally.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AFBE8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C648)
ジューシーな甘さ、[LINE]
グレープ味のグミ。[LINE]
最大ＨＰの７５％分ＨＰが回復する。[END]
English:
//Text $1AFBE8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C648)
A gelatin-based healing medicine.[LINE]
Restores 70% of max HP for one ally.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AFB88
#WRITE(ptr,$18C664)
クセになる甘さ、[LINE]
ドリアン味のグミ。[LINE]
ＨＰが全快するが、まれに……[END]
English:
//Text $1AFB88
#WRITE(ptr,$18C664)
Full HP recovery, but sometimes...[LINE]
Only usable during battle.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AFB28
#WRITE(ptr,$18C680)
ヘルシーな甘さ、[LINE]
ドラゴンフルーツ味のグミ。[LINE]
ブラストゲージが増える。[END]
English:
//Text $1AFB28
#WRITE(ptr,$18C680)
Increase Blast Gauge of one[LINE]
ally. Only usable during battle.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AFAD8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C69C)
ランダムな甘さ、[LINE]
サイコロ印のグミ。[LINE]
ＨＰがランダムで変動する。[END]
English:
//Text $1AFAD8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C69C)
Changes HP to a random value.[LINE]
Only usable during battle.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AFA68
#WRITE(ptr,$18C6B8)
最大ＨＰが１．５倍になるが、[LINE]
回復率が２分の１になる激甘なグミ。[LINE]
戦闘中のみ有効。[END]
English:
//Text $1AFA68
#WRITE(ptr,$18C6B8)
Max HP increase to 150%,[LINE]
but recovery is halved.[LINE]
Only usable during battle.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AFA00
#WRITE(ptr,$18C6D4)
最大ＨＰが７５％になるが、[LINE]
回復率が２倍になる苦めなグミ。[LINE]
戦闘中のみ有効。[END]
English:
//Text $1AFA00
#WRITE(ptr,$18C6D4)
Max HP decrease to 75%,[LINE]
but recovery is doubled.[LINE]
Only usable during battle.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AF9C8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C6F0)
全ての状態異常を回復する薬。[LINE]
[LINE]
[END]

//Text $1AF970
#WRITE(ptr,$18C70C)
全ての状態異常・減少効果を[LINE]
防止する薬。[LINE]
戦闘中のみ有効。[END]
English:
//Text $1AF970
#WRITE(ptr,$18C70C)
Protects against all abnormal[LINE]
statuses, as well as de-buffs.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AF918
#WRITE(ptr,$18C728)
戦闘不能を回復し、[LINE]
最大ＨＰの４０％分[LINE]
ＨＰが回復する薬。[END]
English:
//Text $1AF918
#WRITE(ptr,$18C728)
Contains the water of life.[LINE]
Revives dead ally with 40% HP.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AF8B8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C744)
戦闘不能を回復し、[LINE]
ＨＰを全快にする薬。[LINE]
不老長寿の霊薬とも言われる。[END]
English:
//Text $1AF8B8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C744)
A strange medicine that fully [LINE]
restores HP and cures KO.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AF860
#WRITE(ptr,$18C760)
敵味方が受けるダメージを半減する。[LINE]
もう一度使うと元に戻る。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1AF860
#WRITE(ptr,$18C760)
All damage is halved for everyone.[LINE]
Use another to negate the effect.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AF808
#WRITE(ptr,$18C77C)
一定時間全ての敵の動きを止める。[LINE]
ピンチのときに使うのもアリ！[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1AF808
#WRITE(ptr,$18C77C)
Temporarily stops enemy movements.[LINE]
Only usable during battle.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AF798
#WRITE(ptr,$18C798)
オベロン社が開発した庶民の味方。[LINE]
最大ＨＰの４０％分ＨＰが回復する。[LINE]
元気ハツラツ！[END]
English:
//Text $1AE318
#WRITE(ptr,$18C798)
A liquid medicine from Oberon Corp,[LINE]
Restores 40% of max HP. Not usable[LINE]
during battle.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AF720
#WRITE(ptr,$18C7B4)
オベロン社が開発した働く人の味方。[LINE]
最大ＨＰの６０％分ＨＰが回復する。[LINE]
疲労時の栄養補給に。[END]
English:
//Text $1AF720
#WRITE(ptr,$18C7B4)
A liquid medicine from Oberon Corp.[LINE]
Restores 60% of max HP. Not usable [LINE]
during battle.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AF6A8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C7D0)
オベロン社が開発した戦う人の味方。[LINE]
ＨＰが全快するドリンク。[LINE]
今日のあなたに、この１本！[END]
English:
//Text $1AF6A8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C7D0)
A liquid medicine from Oberon Corp.[LINE]
Restores 100% of max HP. Not usable[LINE]
during battle.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AF650
#WRITE(ptr,$18C7EC)
冷たくてあま～い氷菓子。[LINE]
最大ＨＰの１０％分回復する氷菓子。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1AF650
#WRITE(ptr,$18C7EC)
A cool and sweet frozen treat.[LINE]
Restores 10% of max HP.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AF5E8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C808)
敵とほとんど遭遇しなくなる。[LINE]
一定時間経過か、[LINE]
ダークボトルを使うと元に戻る。[END]
English:
//Text $1AF5E8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C808)
Contains holy essence. Wards off[LINE]
enemies for a fixed duration.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AF580
#WRITE(ptr,$18C824)
敵と遭遇しやすくなる。[LINE]
一定時間経過か、[LINE]
ホーリィボトルを使うと元に戻る。[END]
English:
//Text $1AF580
#WRITE(ptr,$18C824)
Contains evil spirits. Attracts[LINE]
enemies for a fixed duration.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AF548
#WRITE(ptr,$18C840)
毒ガスを中和する薬剤。[LINE]
時間制限あり。[LINE]
[END]

//Text $1AF500
#WRITE(ptr,$18C85C)
体力が３上昇する薬草。[LINE]
心地よい香りで気分を和ませる。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1AF500
#WRITE(ptr,$18C85C)
A medicinal herb that[LINE]
increases vitality by 3.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AF4B8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C878)
攻撃力が１上昇する薬草。[LINE]
ほのかに香るハーブの女王。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1AF4B8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C878)
A medicinal herb that increases[LINE]

Japanese:
//Text $1AF470
#WRITE(ptr,$18C894)
防御力が１上昇する薬草。[LINE]

[END]
English:
//Text $1AF470

A medicinal herb that increases[LINE]

Japanese:
//Text $1AF420
#WRITE(ptr,$18C8B0)
術攻撃力が１上昇する薬草。[LINE]
若返りのハーブと言われる。[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1AF420
#WRITE(ptr,$18C8B0)
A medicinal herb that increases[LINE]

Japanese:
//Text $1AF3D8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C8CC)
術防御力が１上昇する薬草。[LINE]

[END]
English:
//Text $1AF3D8
#WRITE(ptr,$18C8CC)
A medicinal herb that increases[LINE]

[END]
English:

English:
//Text $1AF330

#WRITE(ptr,$18C920)

[END]
English:
//Text $1AF2E0
#WRITE(ptr,$18C920)

//Text $1AF270
#WRITE(ptr,$18C958)

[LINE]
[END]

//Text $1AEF00
#WRITE(ptr,$18CAFC)
初心者用栽培セットの種。[LINE]
「種育て」の[LINE]
サポートタレントアイテム。[END]
English:
//Text $1AEF00
#WRITE(ptr,$18CAFC)
Seeds intended for beginners.[LINE]
A support item for cultivation.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AEEA0
#WRITE(ptr,$18CB18)
脱初心者用栽培セットの種。[LINE]
「種育て」の[LINE]
サポートタレントアイテム。[END]
English:
//Text $1AEEA0
#WRITE(ptr,$18CB18)
Seeds for seasoned gardeners.[LINE]
A support item for cultivation.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AEE40
#WRITE(ptr,$18CB34)
初級者用栽培セットの種。[LINE]
「種育て」の[LINE]
サポートタレントアイテム。[END]
English:
//Text $1AEE40
#WRITE(ptr,$18CB34)
Seeds for learnerning gardening.[LINE]
A support item for cultivation.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AEDE0
#WRITE(ptr,$18CB50)
中級者用栽培セットの種。[LINE]
「種育て」の[LINE]
サポートタレントアイテム。[END]
English:
//Text $1AEDE0
#WRITE(ptr,$18CB50)
Seeds for intermediate use.[LINE]
A support item for cultivation.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AED80
#WRITE(ptr,$18CB6C)
熟練者用栽培セットの種。[LINE]
「種育て」の[LINE]
サポートタレントアイテム。[END]
English:
//Text $1AED80
#WRITE(ptr,$18CB6C)
Seeds for experienced used.[LINE]
A support item for cultivation.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AED20
#WRITE(ptr,$18CB88)
上級者用栽培セットの種。[LINE]
「種育て」の[LINE]
サポートタレントアイテム。[END]
English:
//Text $1AED20
#WRITE(ptr,$18CB88)
Seeds for the proficient.[LINE]
A support item for cultivation.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AECC0
#WRITE(ptr,$18CBA4)
超上級者用栽培セットの種。[LINE]
「種育て」の[LINE]
サポートタレントアイテム。[END]
English:
//Text $1AECC0
#WRITE(ptr,$18CBA4)
Seeds for experts. A support[LINE]
item for cultivation.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AEC60
#WRITE(ptr,$18CBC0)
マスター用栽培セットの種。[LINE]
「種育て」の[LINE]
サポートタレントアイテム。[END]
English:
//Text $1AEC60
#WRITE(ptr,$18CBC0)
Seeds for masters. A support[LINE]
item for cultivation.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AEC08
#WRITE(ptr,$18CBDC)
甘酸っぱい芳香がある果物。[LINE]
「調合」の[LINE]
サポートタレントアイテム。[END]
English:
//Text $1AEC08
#WRITE(ptr,$18CBDC)
A fruit with a sweet and sour aroma.[LINE]
A support item for mixing.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AEBB0
#WRITE(ptr,$18CBF8)
柔らかく多汁で甘い薄紅色の果物。[LINE]
「調合」の[LINE]
サポートタレントアイテム。[END]
English:
//Text $1AEBB0
#WRITE(ptr,$18CBF8)
A sweet fruit with gentle succulence.[LINE]
A support item for mixing.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AEB58
#WRITE(ptr,$18CC14)
球形の液果が房状になる果物。[LINE]
「調合」の[LINE]
サポートタレントアイテム。[END]
English:
//Text $1AEB58
#WRITE(ptr,$18CC14)
Round, fleshy fruits formed in a[LINE]
bunch. A support item for mixing.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AEB00
#WRITE(ptr,$18CC30)
全体がとげにおおわれている果物。[LINE]
「調合」の[LINE]
サポートタレントアイテム。[END]
English:
//Text $1AEB00
#WRITE(ptr,$18CC30)
A fruit entirely covered in prickles.[LINE]
A support item for mixing.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AEAA0
#WRITE(ptr,$18CC4C)
ピタヤとも呼ばれる[LINE]
サボテンの実。「調合」の[LINE]
サポートタレントアイテム。[END]
English:
//Text $1AEAA0
#WRITE(ptr,$18CC4C)
Known as a pitaya and is actually a[LINE]
cactus. A support item for mixing.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AEA48
#WRITE(ptr,$18CC68)
熱帯に自生する果樹。[LINE]
「調合」の[LINE]
サポートタレントアイテム。[END]
English:
//Text $1AEA48
#WRITE(ptr,$18CC68)
A fruit native to the tropics.[LINE]
A support item for mixing.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AE9E0
#WRITE(ptr,$18CC84)
山中に自生し、黄色に熟した実は[LINE]
食べられる。「調合」の[LINE]
サポートタレントアイテム。[END]
English:
//Text $1AE9E0
#WRITE(ptr,$18CC84)
Native to the mountains and is[LINE]
ripe when amber. A support[LINE]
item for mixing.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AE978
#WRITE(ptr,$18CCA0)
古くからお通じの良くなると[LINE]
言われる医薬品。「調合」の[LINE]
サポートタレントアイテム。[END]
English:
//Text $1AE978
#WRITE(ptr,$18CCA0)
Used as medicine to help bowel[LINE]
movements since a long time.[LINE]
A support item for mixing.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AE920
#WRITE(ptr,$18CCBC)
生薬として使われる植物。[LINE]
「調合」の[LINE]
サポートタレントアイテム。[END]
English:
//Text $1AE920
#WRITE(ptr,$18CCBC)
Plant used as a natural remedy.[LINE]
A support item for mixing. [END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AE8B8
#WRITE(ptr,$18CCD8)
料理に香味を加えるとともに[LINE]
消化も助ける。「調合」の[LINE]
サポートタレントアイテム。[END]
English:
//Text $1AE8B8
#WRITE(ptr,$18CCD8)
Adds flavor to cooking and helps[LINE]
with digestion. A support item for[LINE]
mixing.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AE848
#WRITE(ptr,$18CCF4)
肉や魚を保存するときに使う[LINE]
スパイスの一種。「調合」の[LINE]
サポートタレントアイテム。[END]
English:
//Text $1AE848
#WRITE(ptr,$18CCF4)
A spice that is sometimes used[LINE]
in preservation of meat and fish.[LINE]
A support item for mixing.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AE7E0
#WRITE(ptr,$18CD10)
特有の芳香をもち、香料や薬として[LINE]
使われる。「調合」の[LINE]
サポートタレントアイテム。[END]
English:
//Text $1AE7E0
#WRITE(ptr,$18CD10)
Can be used as a spice or[LINE]
medicine due to its aroma.[LINE]
A support item for mixing.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AE780
#WRITE(ptr,$18CD2C)
花の匂いで小動物を誘い捕食する。[LINE]
「調合」の[LINE]
サポートタレントアイテム。[END]
English:
//Text $1AE780
#WRITE(ptr,$18CD2C)
Preys upon small animals it lures.[LINE]
A support item for mixing.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AE718
#WRITE(ptr,$18CD48)
強い香りを放ち、大きな葉をもつ[LINE]
ハーブ。「調合」の[LINE]
サポートタレントアイテム。[END]
English:
//Text $1AE718
#WRITE(ptr,$18CD48)
Herb with strong fragrance.[LINE]
A support item for mixing.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AE6B0
#WRITE(ptr,$18CD64)
肉や魚の臭み取りに用いる[LINE]
スパイスの一種。「調合」の[LINE]
サポートタレントアイテム。[END]
English:
//Text $1AE6B0
#WRITE(ptr,$18CD64)
Spice used to remove the[LINE]
stench from meat and fish.[LINE]
A support item for mixing.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AE658
#WRITE(ptr,$18CD80)
虫に食われて売り物に[LINE]
ならなくなったリンゴ。[LINE]
食べられません！[END]
English:
//Text $1AE658
#WRITE(ptr,$18CD80)
An apple that can no longer[LINE]
be sold because bugs ate it.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AE600
#WRITE(ptr,$18CD9C)
腐ってヌルヌルするモモ。[LINE]
持っただけで[LINE]
嫌な液体が漏れてくる……[END]
English:
//Text $1AE600
#WRITE(ptr,$18CD9C)
Slimy to the touch. You'd get coated[LINE]
in gross liquid if touched.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AE5B0
#WRITE(ptr,$18CDB8)
腐るぐらいが食べごろ。[LINE]
とは言っても……[LINE]
臭すぎて近寄れません！[END]
English:
//Text $1AE5B0
#WRITE(ptr,$18CDB8)
They say it's ripe when it looks[LINE]
rotten. Stay away if it stinks.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AE550
#WRITE(ptr,$18CDD4)
薬として使えそうだが[LINE]
どうみても怪しい……[LINE]
捨てる場所はよく考えましょう！[END]
English:
//Text $1AE550
#WRITE(ptr,$18CDD4)
Looks like it can be used for meds,[LINE]
but definitely looks sketchy. Trash![END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AE4F8
#WRITE(ptr,$18CDF0)
明らかに飲んではいけない色の液体。[LINE]
捨てる場所はよく考えましょう！[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1AE4F8
#WRITE(ptr,$18CDF0)
A liquid with an unappetizing color.[LINE]
It'd be a good idea to throw it away![END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AE498
#WRITE(ptr,$18CE0C)
行ってはいけない方向へ進んだ物質。[LINE]
捨てる場所はよく考えましょう！[LINE]
[END]
English:
//Text $1AE498
#WRITE(ptr,$18CE0C)
Useless to do anything with this.[LINE]
[LINE]
Better to throw this away![END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AE438
#WRITE(ptr,$18CE28)
相手を惑わす不思議な香料。[LINE]
持っている数×１％分[LINE]
お店で割引される。[END]
English:
//Text $1AE438
#WRITE(ptr,$18CE28)
A mysterious, bewitching incense.[LINE]
Receive a 1% discount at shops[LINE]
for each one that you have.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1AE3D8
#WRITE(ptr,$18CE44)
所持数に応じて、[LINE]
ＥＸダンジョン内のみ[LINE]
サポートタレントの時間が短縮！[END]
English:
